review_text: I was having a stressful afternoon and have used Calm-ing products in the past and reached for this one. It is just delicious. It doesn’t have sugar but is a sweetened lemon chamomile drink, I liked it cold then even added ice. I think it would be a good hot beverage too. Good ingredients and the Mg did not cause any GI issues.

I enjoyed this to help me relax and be in a good state to fall asleep, with proven ingredients such as magnesium, melatonin and GABA. The lemon taste is pleasant (mild aftertaste) and the powder mixes easily with water. One small tub has 30 servings so it will last you for quite a while. Overall really liked this, thought it was really effective!

The Mantra Rest is an absolutely fantastic product I added to my nighttime routine when I feel my brain isn't calmed down enough to fall asleep for the night. I add it to a digestive-help tea (which has a fabulous orange flavor itself), so the added Lemon Chamomile blended nicely as far as taste. The Mantra Rest dissolves well and doesn't add any texture to the drink. Wonderful quality product that does its job! 
As a side note, don't take it if you're not ready to go to bed - there were two separate times when unexpectedly I had to do other things before going to sleep, and I got a horrible headache each time. Just be ready for sleep before taking this and you'll absolutely love this product, too!

I’ve been dissolving  this into a cup of hot decaf tea at night and its really helped me sleep more soundly.  I tend to struggle with falling asleep and i feel like i drift off more naturally and stay asleep longer.  The taste is great, mild and i don’t notice an aftertaste.  I will purchase again

review_title: Great part of my evening routine
review_text: This powder has a mild, sweet flavor and has helped me wind down in the evening after really long days. It’s easy to stir in and helps me relax. I’m glad that I bought it and tried it. One recommendation to the creators: tell us what’s in the natural flavors. I would appreciate knowing those details.

review_title: tastes good and helps me sleep
review_text: I got this hoping it would help me on those nights bedtime was coming and I just couldn't sleep. I have found that this is a quality product with ingredients that I can feel confident in. The size of the bottle isnt too bad with the recommended dosage you get pretty good amount for your money. The taste is pretty good and you get the benefit of a good night sleep with waking up groggy.

I'll admit, I have no problem getting to sleep... 3 hours later than my intended bedtime. I do have a problem staying asleep though and when I take this, I can sleep soundly through the night! I take only half a dose! The taste is great and the ingredients are top quality.

I love drinking a cup of this before bed. Not only does it taste good but it does what it says and really helps me sleep. It helps me get to sleep and stay asleep when I'm feeling stressed. I love that it comes in this form because I can control the amount I use. I trust the ingredients and know they are good for sleep too.

Drinking this right now with ice. Love the lemon camomile flavor. Very refreshing. Good  quality and the ingredients are natural and I appreciate no sugar because I try to eat healthy and this helps keep me on track. If it was colder weather I think I’d like it hot. But because it’s summer in Tennessee I’m sticking with the ice.

My stress has been high and my sleep has been impacted. I have been trying to reduce my stress so my sleep can be improved and I discovered this product. And after a few days, my sleep has improved-just one scoop in a glass of water. It tastes  so good! Not overly sweet, not bitter-just right!

Despite my skepticism, I decided to give it a shot, and I'm pleased I did. I was having problems falling asleep every night, but after drinking it for a few nights, I began to sleep better. I like the flavor. fantastic to mix in both heat or cold drinks. I will definitely place another order.

Since adding this drink to my evening routine, I feel like I’ve gotten the benefit of better rest. I really like the taste of the lemon chamomile flavor, especially while I’m winding down from the day. I prefer to drink it hot, like a hot tea, and I usually add collagen protein. It’s a quality product with clean ingredients which is important to me, and the powder mixes well so it’s also smooth. The dosage is easy to measure out and the size of the container is convenient for storage.

I like a yummy, relaxing drink before bed. I found the lemon chamomile to be a refreshing, light flavor that I really enjoy. I’ve tried it cold and hot, and I think I prefer drinking it like a hot tea!  It does contain magnesium, so if you drink too much it can cause some GI issues. If only drinking one serving per day then no issues at all!

Magnesium and melatonin can definitely do wonders for better rest. My suggestion is to add to some herbal tea for better taste. It's got clean ingredients and seems to be a quality supplement. The lemon chamomile goes well with lots of different tea flavors. Good little calming drink before bed.

I am impressed with the benefits Mantra Labs Rest has on my sleep. I take one scoop 30 minutes before bed and it takes me minutes to fall into a deep sleep. The taste is delicious and I can choose warm or cool water. The ingredients are quality and a nice size for travel. I love waking up feeling refreshed.

I like the quality ingredients in this. The benefits are a good night of sleep without all the brain activity keeping me awake. The taste is good with the size dosage you need to take. I wake up refreshed and not groggy with the brain fog so many other sleep aids cause me.

review_title: Calming after day full of attending remote meetings
review_text: As a remote worker, staying energized and focused is crucial. One of my daily rituals involves using a lemon chamomile drink powder, which I simply add to water. This refreshing beverage not only hydrates me but also offers numerous health benefits. Lemon is rich in vitamin C, boosting my immune system and enhancing skin health. Chamomile, known for its calming properties, helps reduce stress and improve sleep quality. This simple addition to my routine has improved my overall well-being and productivity.

I really wanted to try something that would calm my racing mind, relax me, and help my get a good night sleep.  This is it!  The taste is great - perfect mix of Lemon with a bit of Chamomille.  I am not drinking it every day, but I really do notice how much better I feel the next day when I do.

I had a positive experience with Rise and Go products so I thought I'd give Rest a try as well. It does not disappoint.  It does exactly what the name says and provided a much needed calming rest of my mind and body. It does contain Stevia but the overall flavor was pretty good.  It mixed and dissolved quickly and easily.

According to my tracker, I get better quality sleep when I take Rest versus when I don’t. And having a newborn - quality is definitely a plus when quantity isn’t so high! I was surprised at the tiny size of the container, but it does contain 30 servings, so I guess it just takes less space in my cabinet 🤗

I'm always skeptica about supplements and teas, but thought I'd buy this for my husband who struggles to fall asleep. We've tried a few other things (hence the skepticism) and they haven't really worked. This tea however, seems to really help! I can see him wind down and relax after drinking and he's usually snoring about an hour after drinking. Would recommend!
Iam mixing a spoon of powder with a cup of water and drinking at night before my bedtime. It has chamomile which helps us to give a relax night
Just put into water or juice and stir.  Tastes fine too.  I like that it is third party tested and non GMO.  I stay asleep better and wake up refreshed not groggy.

This is super easy to take before bedtime.  I just add a scoop in a small amount of juice.  It tastes good which is nice.  Third party lab tested and vegan, soy and dairy free.  Helps relax my body which helps me to fall asleep faster.
Very happy with this product &  brand. The taste is really good and it dissolved easily in my water. Will definitely be trying some if the other flavors for sure.
very nice quality ingredients and the taste is really good.  been using for a week at night and can feel a difference in my sleep.
Works great after a stressful day to help calm you down. Didn’t give me any weird dreams and didn’t wake up groggy. My son with adhd also enjoyed it!
This stuff works great! Easy to dissolve in water and has a great flavor. Just the right amount of melatonin to help me fall asleep and stay asleep, but I'm not groggy the next day.
I was so excited to try this product!  As I age I struggle more and more with falling and staying asleep.  This definitely helps and tastes great!  This will be a product I use often.
This has been helpful for my sleep pattern. I was having trouble falling asleep until I started taking this at night. Now I go to sleep within 20 minutes of taking it. It tastes great too

This is a nice soothing drink with a light lemon chamomile flavor. It helps you relax before bed and doesn’t leave you feeling groggy in the morning. It’s easy to mix and drink, making it a good choice for better sleep.
Great ingredients all in one good tasting product. Chamomile has always been a go to for me. The addition of melatonin and magnesium are just what's needed to get a good night's rest.

The ingredients are really well balanced and I've noticed better, more restful sleep. They have played attention to making it taste great, which is nice. It's a good quality item at an affordable price.
I always sleep better taking magnesium before bed. The addition of melatonin and chamomile really helps me get a good night's sleep. It has a very pleasant taste as well.
I started drinking this a few nights ago instead of my tea. It has a nice flavor and I feel totally relaxed shortly after. I've been sleeping well since drinking this!
I like how this is a wide mouth jar so you can easily get a scoop out. It dissolves easily in water and tastes great!  It helps me unwind and fall asleep easily.
Starting using this to help me fall asleep and stay asleep. So far it's been great. The taste is delicious and easy to follow dosage. I have been getting restful sleeps!

This is a must  have supplement. All the ingredients are great alone, but together are definitely the best. I was taking magnesium for years and this blend was highly recommended to me.  I like that it's powder, very easy to take and with great flavor.
I’ve been having a hard time sleeping so I wanted to give this a try to help me out. I think it’s working well and it tastes “calming”

This has a great lemony flavor and makes a nice pre-bedtime drink that helps with sleep. The GABA, melatonin, and magnesium are all nice gentle ways to encourage the body to rest. This is a high quality product and I recommend it.
The lemon and chamomile flavors were really great. I can clearly see the ingredients and it helped me to relax when I took it. Would buy again, thank you

I like that this is vegan paleo and keto, non-GMO, soy free, dairy free, and gluten-free.  I have been using this for about a week and am sleeping better and not feeling groggy when I wake up.  I also like the taste
I like the way this tastes and it feels like a good way to wind down and relax while also being hydrating.
This has been very helpful for me. It is easy to take and taste great. Very happy with the quality of the ingredients.
I love how this just calms me right down and makes me feel like I can go to sleep easily.
Easy to mix and have a great taste. Premium quality ingredients.
Definitely great for relaxing after a long day! Easy to use and tastes ok.
I love this about an hour before bedtime. I'm out like a light and stay asleep all night long. It tastes great too!
